Workers

Every user has one dedicated worker which is a process running on the server. This worker has limited memory in order to protect the server from being overloaded.

Whenever you use a new Event Trigger or Action Dispatcher, which uses some built-in modules, your available memory will decrease. Since there is currently no safe way to unrequire modules it might be necessary for you to restart your worker if you required a lot of modules that used up all your available space!
